thread.section_title: Hotel Morgana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location, great food and friendly staff!
thread.title_full: Perfect location, great food and friendly staff! - Review of Hotel Morgana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: emilymcnair
title: Perfect location, great food and friendly staff!
text:
We stayed at Hotel Morgana last October and I could not recommend it enough.
For what we paid I felt the room exceeded my expectations, and the free drinks in the mini bar came as a pleasant surprise.
Breakfast in the morning was really good, and I never had an empty coffee cup!
Location wise it is great for most things. We walked everywhere except for the Vatican City which we took a taxi to.
Over all I couldn't recommend this hotel enough to everyone. Will be returning when I get to visit beautiful Rome again in the future!
